title: Bloomberg Markets: Morgan on Sticking With Stocks
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Morgan on Sticking With Stocks
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Rob Morgan Chief Investment Officer Sandy Spring Trust Discussing his market outlook and why he likes stocks over bonds.
